dialogue.text: I have a request for you. Can you ask #bMaed#k for a potion of my devise? Obviously, don't mention I have asked you that, that would be a problem. #bKeeny#k got an illness due to the contact with the Huroids, this have bothering me so much I couldn't give progress on my researches... Please #rbring her the potion#k, so that I could feel better and start making progress. I'm counting on you.
